en.title: FE's Soft Launch In Manila, Philippines 3rd May 2008.
en.content:
FE's soft launch at Jade Valley Restaurant, Manila, Philippines on 3rd May 2008 was a GREAT SUCCESS! FE would like to thank the Country Licensee Jeremiah Looi and all FE leaders who helped make the event successful.

FE would also like to thank Philippine Basketball Association legends Samboy Lim (Skywalker) and Allan Caidic (the Triggerman), and Jaime Fabregas (veteran Filipino actor) for sharing their wonderful testimonials.

Also present at the event was Angelo Que, Philippines top golfer and winner of the 2008 Philippines Golf Open Championship, and now part of FE's international team. Angelo was highly impressed with FE's Quantum Pendant.

Former Royal London Circus owner and promoter Paul Lee gave an inspiring testimonial, together with his wife Doris.

Thanks to Jean Daniels (international Golf Long-Drive Specialist) for sharing his testimonial, to Dr Siva for his presentation on Scalar Energy and Quantum Pendant, and to KC Phoon for demonstrating the powers of the Quantum Pendant.

A special thanks also to Judge Lorenzo B. Veneracion, Charter President Rotary Club of Quezon City North, and President & Executive Trustee to the Foundation for the Soup Kitchen, Food Bank & Training Center Inc and Lighthouse Center for Children Foundation Inc, for his support and dedication.

FE looks forward to the launch in Philippines on 31st May 2008, which promises to be a great event!
